advisory.name: RLEA-2022:1978
advisory.synopsis: pcs bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for pcs is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: pcs should validate resource/stonith agents metadata upon reading
Support version 1.1 of the OCF Resource Agent API standard
Misleading error message from pcs quorum unblock if wait_for_all=0
New web UI - add more functionalities to the cluster management
Repair issues with constraints in new web UI
update-scsi-devices command unfence a node without quorum [rhel-8.6.0]
[RFE] Provide add/remove syntax for command `pcs stonith update-scsi-devices` [rhel-8.6.0]
New web UI - add cluster setup
New web UI - add permission management
Enabling sbd before starting the cluster sets an incorrect `validate-with` value in /var/lib/pacemaker/cib/cib.xml
New web UI: Fence Device data can not be loaded because of prefix "stonith:"
corosync-qdevice not being automatically enabled when declaring a quorum device in RHEL 8.5 cluster
When a fence-scsi storage device becomes unavailable, pcs cannot remove it from configuration and add a running one
Error: Agent 'ocf:linbit:drbd' is not installed or does not provide valid metadata: Element content failed to validate content, line 117, use --force to override
pcs_snmp_agent fails to get cluster status due to uninitialized constant PCS_INTERNAL
Pcs should process agents not conforming to OCF schema in the same way as before
